评论概述: Great style and fabric, wrong color
评论详情: Great shirt!, Fabric very soft design fabulous. However, the brown is not a deep brown as shown in the picture, it is a much lighter sort of milk, chocolate brown.

This is basically a long sleeve T-shirt with appliqué sewn on to it. The stars and the trim are of a very cheap material. None of this is as promised. The picture looks like a fleece sweatshirt and that is definitely not what you get. It’s very thin and flimsy and not cozy at all. It looks and feels cheap.
This sweatshirt is so cute and fits so nice. I got a medium (usually a small) for the over sized fit and it’s perfect!
This top is a really fp dupe! It fits oversized. I ordered my true size and it fits good. Washes well. Will need to steam or iron due to the edges flaring up on the seams and the stars.

I like this shirt a lot more than I thought I would - easy fit and nicely made, this washes up nicely with no colors running. All the "raw hems" are stitched as well so it won't get ragged. Shrank just a little so it's not quite as boxy which is fine.  I typically wear a medium but I ordered a small and it fits fine; if you want a looser more casual fit, go with your regular size. This is not a fleece sweatshirt - it's a long-sleeve heavy cotton  t-shirt which is perfect for me.  Really cute and comfortable!
